description:
Noah is one of those guys who can do just about anything.

He's the jack-of-all-trades so to speak. His interests range from photography to racing cars to reading about history. He works full-time in a professional career job, but comes home and works as a handyman around town. He says word of mouth is the only thing that keeps him doing his handywork... he's got a lot of satisfied customers. If you need anything fixed, this is your man.
title: Noah
